title: Champ select page does not load after clicking Accept
body:
Hi,

Champ select page does not load after clicking Accept, it  is stuck at the Accept/Decline page, forcing me to dodge ranked games.
This happens twice.

@Riot: Please check. Is this a bug or what? Making me lose LP for dodging by closing client.

replies.body:
First off make sure your GPU drivers are up to date, then run a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
